      Test that the CA refuses to issue certificates outside of the PrivateKeyUsagePeriod, but that it does issue a cert within this period.

      Testing that the certificate's serial number is generated with the correct length, according to "CA serial number octet size" that is configured to CA.

      Testing that the certificate's serial number is generated with the correct length, according to "CA serial number octet size" that is configured to CA.

      Tests using different DN orders in issued certificates.
      void testDNOverride()
      Testing that DN override works.
      void testEndEntityInformationCsrAlgorithmEnforced()
      Testing that CSR algorithm is enforced from end entity information if there is one.
      void testExtendedCAServices()  
      void testGeneratingCertificateWithPublicKeyFromProvidedRequestMessage()
      Testing generating certificate with public key from providedRequestMessage (providedPublicKey and endEntityInformation.extendedInformation.certificateRequest must be null).
      void testInvalidSignatureAlg()  
      void testPrintableString()
      Tests default value of "use printable string" option (should be disabled by default) and tests that the option works.

      • testCAPrivateKeyUsagePeriodRequest

        public void testCAPrivateKeyUsagePeriodRequest()
                                        throws Exception
        Test that the CA refuses to issue certificates outside of the PrivateKeyUsagePeriod, but that it does issue a cert within this period. This test has some timing, so it sleeps in total 11 seconds during the test.
        Throws:
        Exception - Fail

      • testCaSerialNumberWithDefaultOctetSize20

        public void testCaSerialNumberWithDefaultOctetSize20()
                                              throws Exception
        Testing that the certificate's serial number is generated with the correct length, according to "CA serial number octet size" that is configured to CA. "CA serial number octet size" is left to be default 20 bytes here
        Throws:
        Exception - Fail

      • testCaSerialNumberWithOctetSize4

        public void testCaSerialNumberWithOctetSize4()
                                      throws Exception
        Testing that the certificate's serial number is generated with the correct length, according to "CA serial number octet size" that is configured to CA. "CA serial number octet size" is configured to be 4 bytes here
        Throws:
        Exception - Fail
